> **âš ï¸ Notice:** This is an early prototype of the library. Future updates will include broader recipe support, faster execution, and more advanced decoding capabilities.

> **Chaf** is a Python library designed to **automatically** detect and decode encrypted text using the **[CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/)** web interface. You simply provide an encoded string, and the library processes it to identify the encryption type and return the decoded result in structured **JSON format**.

### Installation and Development ğŸš€

### Via **PyPi** âš¡ï¸
```shell
# via PyPi
pip install Chaf -U
```

### ğŸš€ Quick Start 
```python
from Chaf import CyberChef
c: CyberChef = CyberChef("")   # ZGVlcA==
c.get()
```
